reason_for_emotion: Claimant reported persistent back pain and expressed concern about the damage to their vehicle
claim_summary: Policyholder Bugs Bunny reported a car accident in which he was rear-ended while stopped at a red light. The incident resulted in back pain and damage to his vehicle.
